overview:
Fuboo is a digital publishing platform the produces multimedia books for tablets, smartphones and the web, initially aimed at the creation of interactive books for young people.

Fuboo will launch with a multimedia book called ‘My Random Digi-Life’ written by Emer McCourt for 10 - 12 year-old girls. Fuboo is driven by a management team who has worked at the cutting edge of film, tech, music and entertainment retail, who also has publishing experience and direct access to rights holders. We offer publishers, authors and agents an opportunity to create highly interactive ebooks in the most cost effective and efficient way possible within a space where reading great stories is brought to a new level of engagement through animation, user generated content, photos, music, video, sharing and shopping.
